body_html:
The resolution to this issue only fixes libtensorflow.so, the same issue is still present in libtensorflow_cc.so

The fix is a single line, the diff is below:

diff --git a/tensorflow/BUILD b/tensorflow/BUILD
index a162bcf..b2f9474 100644
--- a/tensorflow/BUILD
+++ b/tensorflow/BUILD
@@ -466,6 +466,7 @@ cc_binary(

 cc_binary(
     name = "libtensorflow_cc.so",
+    linkopts = [ "-Wl,--version-script=tensorflow/tf_version_script.lds" ],
     linkshared = 1,
     deps = [
         "//tensorflow/c:c_api",

body:
The resolution to this issue only fixes libtensorflow.so, the same issue is still present in libtensorflow_cc.so

The fix is a single line, the diff is below:
```
diff --git a/tensorflow/BUILD b/tensorflow/BUILD
index a162bcf..b2f9474 100644
--- a/tensorflow/BUILD
+++ b/tensorflow/BUILD
@@ -466,6 +466,7 @@ cc_binary(

 cc_binary(
     name = "libtensorflow_cc.so",
+    linkopts = [ "-Wl,--version-script=tensorflow/tf_version_script.lds" ],
     linkshared = 1,
     deps = [
         "//tensorflow/c:c_api",
```
